pkgmetadata.longdescription: # orion-utilsorionutils provides collection generation for testing Galaxy and related projects.## ReleasingTo release a new version of orion-utils, follow these steps:1. Change the version in setup.py2. Generate a distribution of the new version: python setup.py sdist3. Upload to PyPI twine upload dist/orionutils-*.tar.gzYou must have PyPI credentials for an account with upload permissions.
